name: Simple Shortcuts
description: Simple Chrome extension that adds useful shortcuts.

go-incognito.description: Open the current tab(s) in incognito

open-tab-near.description: Open tab near current and in same group

add-tab-to-current-group.description: Open tab at the end of the current group

open-tab-at-end.description: Open tab at the end of all tabs

move-tabs-to-front.description: Move highlighted tab(s) to the front

move-tabs-to-back.description: Move highlighted tab(s) to the back

switch-to-last-tab.description: Switch to the last active tab

copy-url.description: Copy current tab URL to clipboard

move-tabs-to-window.description: Move highlighted tab(s) to different window (cycle)

move-all-groups.description: Move all groups to front or back
